meta.description: Max Kruiswegt is a Dutch full-stack developer.

home.title: Hey, I'm Max👋
home.subtitle: Mobile & Web Developer
home.bio: Information Technology student at Inholland Haarlem, currently working as a frontend developer at DTT Multimedia. I build cross-platform mobile apps and modern web experiences with React Native, Vue, and TypeScript.

kaizen.description: Pomodoro timer app with Focus Rooms for studying together. Virtual body doubling, without the video calls.

mkdevelopment.description: Business website for my web development agency. Showcasing services, team, and handling client inquiries.
